The general sense of the other categories should be understood in light of this.
The other aspects of discernment should be explained in the light of the previous section.

source_sentence: 說一切有部發智大毘婆沙論卷第九十二
translation: Saṃyuktâgama Abhidharma-mahāvibhāṣā-śāstra, vol. 92
